citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:15 to 1:45
pm on 18-Oct-16.
During that time, the inspector waited at the residence and called the available phone number on file leaving a
message.
